issue.title: bizError & httpError job parameters
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

These paramaters will be obsolete in a next version. They have been foreseen to test HTTP only services. To achieve this requirement, it would be far better to use the serviceType parameter set to "HTTP".

For now, the monitor will check for the errors, but if set to false, he will not take care about the result and will set the status as Available

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

This is an old and very specific ticket & the community plans to make a large MONITOR refactoring.

Therefore, this ticket is rejected.
